WATCH.CLEANUP_MIRRORS:
Remove mirrors that are
not currently visible
WATCH.EDIT_MODE_EXPLANATION:
Overlays can now be moved and tuned individually.
Control which overlays are visible on this set:

EDIT_MODE.DELETE: Long press to remove from current set
EDIT_MODE.HINT_POINT_WINDOW:
Point at a window to change its parameters.
Once done, leave edit mode using the button on the right.
EDIT_MODE.POS_STATIC: Static: Stay in place and never recenter.
EDIT_MODE.POS_ANCHORED: Anchored: Moves together with the rest of the set. Default.
EDIT_MODE.POS_FLOATING: Floating: Stay in place, recenter when shown.
